title: Champion nerfs @riot
body:
I think its time for you guys to man up and hard nerf champions. 
We're all tired of you guys soft nerfing champions because youre terrified they'll become useless and no one will play them.
Id rather not wait 2-4 weeks over 2+ patches for you to slowly adjust champs.

* If it so happens that you overnerfed a champion you can always hotfix it (like you did with many champs last patch), either way its just super depressing with the way you nerf champs currently.

{{champion:57}} {{champion:245}} {{champion:105}} {{champion:13}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:236}} , etc.

Idc if you guys want to down vote, but honestly these so called nerfs are just so weak, its just sad.


Edit: P.S. Since you guys decided to make everyone broken, and the champs that are considered balanced arent played much, might as well give us 4-5 bans each, instead of 3. Thanks.

replies.body: But, my Azir gets his ult duration out to 3 seconds from 5/6/7, removing movement speed too and not being able to cast W on towers, meanwhile Zed gets 30 damage taken off his Q and Second Shuriken damage buffed from 50% to 75%. Favorism in its finest.

that nerf to azir wont do shit to his laning phase he will still be dominant af and his tf presence is way too good anyways i would call it a fair nerf

but i agree the zed nerf is like nothing

Azir is a champion that has gotten 1v4 quadra kills in a professional environment, without being fed. I'm not defending the relatively small Zed nerfs, here, there needs to be a bigger hit to w in my opinion. Or a hit to his attack speed, to make lifesteal less useful. I can justify my ideas, but this isn't the thread for that.

As I was saying, Azir has a far higher winrate, and he is also crushingly unfun to play against as most champs.
Did the numbers, Zeds single Q loses 10% damage in return for his double Q doing 10% more damage.
Throw in the fact that zed doesn't build {{item:3089}} {{item:3089}} {{item:3089}} {{item:3089}} {{item:3089}} {{item:3089}}

maokai has been strong since the first day i played him, hes never been OP or in need of a Nerf hammer, small changes here and there to keep him in tune with the rest of the game, yes.
 but he is on the strong side of the balanced champs list and if you face a good mao, he can **feel** OP AF that's for sure :)

As people have said in this thread, Maokai isn't even one of those that are OP.  He hasn't really been changed (only nerfed actually).  People are just finally realizing that he's a good pick top bc the pros use him suddenly - that's how it usually goes isn't it?

The rest definitely need some pretty severe nerfs, and this coming from someone who plays a lot of zed recently - and played tank ekko jungle to well over mastery 5 since 2-3 weeks after his release.  Long before it became this popular/meta.

I said he was flat out broken from the start, and none of his "nerfs" have ever fixed that.

As far as Ryze goes, I wish they would just revert him to how he was originally, before any rework... MUCH healthier, and MUCH more fun.  Didn't need a rework nearly as bad as some other champs in this game.

And fizz... well, fuck fizz.
